description: Students study the role of music in worship with an emphasis on strategies for developing music groups, including handbells and Orff instruments, in worship and church education. Prerequisite: Music 214 or permission of instructor. Offered Fall Semester, 2006-07. and alternate years.
name: Church Music Pract I
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 214 or permission of instructor. Offered Fall Semester, 2006-07. and alternate years.
title: Church Music Practicum I
